items.content_html: I haven’t been driving for long (about 1 year), but I’ve always thought that when I have to slow down because an oncoming car is passing an obstacle in the road, the driver has made a mistake - he hasn’t estimated the distance of the oncoming car. Today I made the same mistake. I feel ashamed. ğŸ˜³
